page.title: 20 Games and Activities
page.content: The farming calendar revolves around {LADY DAY September 29th.& MICHAELMAS {March 29th.}North Petherwin{Singers meet regularly to practice old Cornish songs,traditionally sung around the parish at Christmas time.Collections of money are donated to Action for the Crippled Child,Leukaemia Research & National Heart Foundation.The customs of{Harvest and flower festivals which involve the church are strong. The{ceremonial traditions}of weddings, christenings & burials prevail. Childrens outdoor{ball and skipping {games}accompanied with song are always popular mainly with girl participants, and boys like{fishing}in the R.Attery. Indoors children attempt{chess,puzzles and{draughts,& building with plastic {bricks }called LEGO making space stations and playing with model robots and aliens.
